# Innovin Labs - LLM Information

> Innovin Labs is a technology consulting and software development company that helps startups and small businesses build bold, scalable tech fast.

## About Us
Innovin Labs is more than a name — it's a reflection of how we turn raw ideas into purposeful products. We partner closely with founders as an extension of their team—delivering tailored tech solutions, strong product thinking, and hands-on engineering support across every stage of product development.

## Our Services
- Smart Product Development: AI-enhanced coding and development solutions
- AI-Enhanced Design and Prototyping: Data-driven design with rapid prototyping
- Strategic Technology Consulting: Custom technology roadmaps and solutions
- Strategic AI Consulting: Tailored AI solutions for business challenges

## Our Expertise
- Network of Tech SMEs with 20+ companies in our partner ecosystem
- 50+ vetted tech experts across all domains
- Full-stack development with React, Next.js, Node.js, Python
- Mobile development with React Native, Flutter
- AI/ML solutions with OpenAI, LangChain, and custom models
- Cloud infrastructure on AWS, GCP, Azure

## Contact
- Website: https://innovinlabs.com
- Email: info@innovinlabs.com

## Tech Stack
We leverage world-class technologies including:
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, NestJS, Django
- Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Expo
- Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel
- AI/ML: OpenAI, LangChain, TensorFlow

## Locations
- Trivandrum, India (Headquarters)
- Melbourne, Australia
- San Francisco, CA, USA
